original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 306.50/60 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 306.50/60 to the US dollar in the spot forex market on Tuesday, stronger from 306.95/307.10 on Monday, dealers said, while bond yields were quiet ahead of the auction.
The Colombo Stock Market opened down; the All Share Price Index was down 0.05 percent at 11,118, the S&P SL20 was up 0.23 percent at 3,182 (Colombo/Mar12/2024)
